column2: datatable(all_movies_with_ratings_df50K %>% arrange((Title_year)) %>% select(Title_year, Metascore_rating) %>% rename("Title (Year)" = Title_year, "Metascore Rating" = Metascore_rating), caption = "Table 1: Metascore Ratings of Movies (released in 2000-2019 w/ 50K+ IMDb reviews)",options = list(pageLength = 8,
